author: jboynes
msg: add a service that will load extensions by scanning a directory
add RuntimeInfo so that the scanner knows where to find the directory

author: jmsnell
msg: Fixing up the build script so that the produced dist zips are correct
Better handling of the security conditional build
Three zips will be created, one for the jdk1.5, one for jdk1.4.2 and one for source
Updated some of the build documentation
Exclude the zips from the svn image

author: agilliland
msg: couple more tweaks to fix up previewing.
- parsed preview request now supports heavyweight accessors for Theme pojo.
- preview servlet now uses heavyweight methods of preview request.
- preview servlet no longer makes ad-hoc page request for model init data, it can use a real preview request since that is now a subclass of page request.
